sen.e: This was because he took the side of the Western Camp along with his eldest son, Yoshimasa, in the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600, where he attacked Tango no kuni Tanabe-jo Castle (Tango Province) protected by Yusai HOSOKAWA of the Eastern Camp.
